page.title: 03LADY PATRICIA MILNES-COATES
page.content: {Lady Patrica is the only titled {person in our D-block.Her husband and {herself have lived at Moorhouse Farm {since 1951.Her husband died three {years ago in 1982. { The house, when they arrived, was a {tip.There was no indoor lighting or {indoor lavatories and the house had {not been decorated for about 20 {years!Lady Patricia does not live at {Helperby Hall because she likes the {people and the land in her present {surroundings. { When the renovation was started the {Milnes-Coates family moved out. Not {only were the buildings dilapidated {but the arable land was of very poor {quality too.Lady Patricia's husband {had studied agricultural sciences at {Cambridge and was very keen to put his {learning into practice. They attempted {to farm their land by organic methods.
